exceptions.tactic: intros K V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' H1 H2.

original: intros K V b a x H1 H2. unfold ex_pseries in *. intros [la Hla] [lb Hlb]. split. - apply is_pseries_plus; auto. - apply PSeries_correct. apply is_pseries_plus; auto.
